attributes.action: Remove the Chancellor of the Exchequer from office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is impossible for a large developed economy to function effectively without full confidence in its management.  

•	The loss of personal details of 15,000 Standard Life Pension Customers.

•	A calamitous tax credit system.

•	The ineffectual bailing out of Northern Rock to the tune of £1,000 for every household in the UK.

•	The loss of personal details of 25m UK households.

The above inexcusable errors of system and judgement have led to a destruction of confidence and make the Chancellor’s position untenable.  We urge you to put the UK’s economy above party loyalties.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
